content: आगत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Come, arrived. {@--2@} Occurred, happened. {@--3@} Obtained, got; न्यायागतधनं <ls>Y. 3. 205</ls>; °साध्वस afraid; °क्षोभ perplexed; अन्वय° hereditary; °मन्यु angry; °विस्मय surprised. {@--4@} Reduced to, fallen into (a particular state); दासत्वं, पंचत्वं, संदेहं, विस्मयं &c. {@--5@} Living or residing in. --तं {@--1@} Coming, arrival. {@--2@} Occurrence, event.
